name: n-octyl phosphonic acid (NOPA)- modified titanium dioxide
FoodContactSubstance: n-octyl phosphonic acid (NOPA)- modified titanium dioxide, (produced by chemically reacting NOPA (CAS Reg. No. 4724-48-5) with titanium dioxide to achieve a treatment level of 0.85% by weight of NOPA on the pigment).
notifier: Huntsman Tioxide/Tioxide Europe S.A.S./Tioxide Europe S.L.
manufacturer: Huntsman Tioxide/Tioxide Europe S.A.S./Tioxide Europe S.L.
